main.name: Hi, I'm Christian Sevilla
main.description: A passionate Tech enthusiast determined to unleash the complete potential of full stack development and create a profound impact in the digital realm.
main.bio: Hello, I'm Christian Roy Sevilla, a dedicated aspiring full-stack developer driven by my passion to make a meaningful impact in the digital realm. I am currently pursuing my studies at Lithan EduClaas, where I am specializing in Applied Degree in Software Engineering, and at University of Cebu - Banilad Campus, where I am majoring in Bachelor of Science in Information Technology. My fascination with technology began when I recognized the world's increasing reliance on technology and its transformative power.

resume.skillmessage: With expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap, ReactJS, MySQL, Java, Spring Boot, REST API, and proficiency in Visual Studio Code, Eclipse JEE, and Spring Tool Suite 3, I am skilled in creating captivating websites, developing scalable applications, designing intuitive user experiences, and managing efficient databases. My proficiency enables me to deliver high-quality solutions that provide exceptional user experiences.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Developed a Web Application using Odoo 13

work.description:

work.title: Customer Care Associate

Taking calls according to policies, procedures, and standards with defined quality
 Handling customer's concerns, queries, and complaints

 Keeping company information secured amd confidential
